weekly_top_story.headline: Switzerland to boost US investment by $200 billion with a deal to lower US tariffs on Swiss goods
weekly_top_story.summary: Switzerland has announced plans to invest $200 billion in the United States through 2028 following an agreement that reduces US tariffs on Swiss products, potentially strengthening economic ties and trade between the two countries.

stories.headline: At least 9 killed and 32 injured in explosion at Kashmir police station
stories.summary: A cache of confiscated explosives detonated inside a police station in Indian-administered Kashmir, resulting in multiple casualties and raising security concerns in the volatile region.

stories.headline: Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu and Russian President Putin discuss Middle East situation
stories.summary: Netanyahu and Putin held a phone conversation exchanging views on the complex Middle East conflict, reflecting ongoing international diplomatic efforts in the region.
